availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew D. Campbell (Estill County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Park Campbell in Estill County, Kentucky, on January 6, 1825. Married to Elizabeth Scrivner Campbell. Father of Thomas J. Campbell, Mary Campbell, John S. Campbell, William F. Campbell, Amanda Campbell, Silas S. Campbell, Nancy L. Campbell, Margaret Campbell and Ansel D. Campbell. Farmer in Estill County in 1850. Farmer in Estill County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 67B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 206.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Millers Creek, p. 588A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Estill County Marriages, Film #000254628, p. 41.
"Andrew D. Campbell (1798-1884)," Find A Grave, Memorial #32123196, accessed December 10, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/32123196.
